/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in a palette of colors that add vibrancy to the scene. A blue fence runs along the right side of the street, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene with a warm glow.
